sentences.en: A briefing that gave us a fix on the current situation.
sentences.cn: 开会之前,我先给你简单说一下情况.

sentences.en: After all the briefing sessions at head office, our sales team is at concert pitch.
sentences.cn: 在总公司开过各种情况介绍会后, 我们全体销售人员都跃跃欲试,准备大干一场.

sentences.en: Charles and I were closeted in his study for the briefing session.
sentences.cn: 我和查尔斯在他的书房里闭门开简介会。

sentences.en: Do what the briefing calls for.
Don't you want me to have a shred of credibility in the briefing room?
sentences.cn: 难道你不想让我在简报室里有一点点可信度 吗 ?

sentences.en: He spent two hours mugging up the statistics before briefing the press.
sentences.cn: 在向记者们介绍情况之前,他花了两个小时突击统计数字.

sentences.en: His skill was diplomacy; his briefing on weapons system had obviously been rudimentary.
sentences.cn: 他是外交专家, 虽然听过有关武器系统的情况介绍,显然还是一知半解.

sentences.en: I asked him to draw up a list of what they're saying at the briefing.
sentences.cn: 我要他把记者在新闻发布会上说的话开一张单子.

sentences.en: Lei , deputy governor of the peace to attend the briefing.
sentences.cn: 副州长雷和平出席汇报会.

sentences.en: May I ask when you received your last intelligence briefing?
sentences.cn: 您能告诉我您何时得到的最新情况的简报 吗 ?

sentences.en: Ministerial colleagues were briefing against him.
sentences.cn: 其他部长在攻击诋毁他。

sentences.en: Now , BilI's been briefing me, of course, but this guy's your informant, right?
sentences.cn: 比尔跟我简报过了那家伙是你的线民?

sentences.en: The President received a briefing by telegram.
sentences.cn: 总统收到用电报发来的一份简报。

sentences.en: Then they were shown, to the door for a short briefing.
sentences.cn: 然后他们被带到门口,简单介绍了一下情况.

sentences.en: They're holding a press briefing tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 他们明天将召开新闻发布会。

sentences.en: We were sufficiently uneasy about possible misinterpretations that we had prepared a careful press briefing.
sentences.cn: 我们对可能产生的错误解释十分不安,因此准备了一份措辞严谨的新闻介绍材料.
